name: cloudflare-engineer
description: Platform Architect capabilities for Cloudflare - D1 Query Optimization, Cloudflare Workflows, External Logging (Axiom/Better Stack), Python Workers, Zero Trust Tooling, R2 Cost Protection, and AI Cost Detection. Includes Edge-Native Constraints, Vibecoder Proactive Safeguards, Loop Protection, billing safety, recursion guards, queue safety, Privacy Filters, cost simulation, and session-aware hooks.
